name: 安迪·菲尔德
introduction: Andy Field is an American voice actor. He has appeared in numerous video games such as Paladins, Marvel Avengers Academy, Five Nights at Freddy's VR: Help Wanted, Five Nights At Freddy's: Sister Location, Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator, The Conjuring House, The Dark Occult, Contagion, Rico, Nelo, and countless international titles. He also has recorded national commercials for brands like Virgin Mobile, Walmart, Homewood Suites, Trivago, New York Life, and Blue Cross/Blue Shield. A former teacher, he teaches beginning voiceover classes to students from around the world.
